message: Does anyone think that a homogeneous team such as ZZ is at a disadvantage vs a mixed-race team, such as TP or ZP -- whether due to army composition or some other factor?
I always kind of figured the opposite since their timing attacks synch up perfectly.  For example, a ZZ team's 7 roach rush would be insanely strong
On the other hand, you can't do crazy stuff like the mothership vortex + nuke or heal protoss bio units with medivacs etc

Funny you mention double 7rr, as that's a build my teammate and I have actually had a lot of success with.  :)  We run into more trouble when we try to play 'standard', and often up losing to to M&M/Zealot pushes.
